analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol:
	Contract _RamenCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

_RamenCoin._BLOCKS_PER_READJUSTMENT should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol#226-227)
_RamenCoin._MAXIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol#240-241)
_RamenCoin._MINIMUM_TARGET should be constant (/unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol#230-232)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol#390:
	- Usage of "block.blockhash()" should be replaced with "blockhash()"

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol#175) is not in mixedCase
Parameter 'challenge_digest' of _RamenCoin.mint (/unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol#306) is not in mixedCase

Parameter 'challenge_digest' of _RamenCoin.checkMintSolution (/unique_chucks/5/0xee8965ca57f9d252a8d5da1faa5f7d85ad78a24f.sol#486-488) is not in mixedCase
